report-setting: Please select the report language, file format, and file package options before making an analysis request. The full file package includes the analysis report, the Excel file that was uploaded, and an Excel file with the result of the analysis.

excel.title: Excel File Analysis
description: When requesting an analysis, please upload
Excel file containing the patient's health checkup result data. To request more analyses, please upload one file at a time.
It is highly recommended that you enter and upload data according to the sample template.

header.info: Please upload an Excel file containing the patient's health checkup result data. This can be your own template or the sample template provided below.
header.upload-tooltip: Please upload the file you want to request analysis for
header.excel-file: Sample Excel file for requesting risk assessment

excel.submit-tooltip: Please submit the report for analysis

input.title: Analysis Request Form

title: Fill in the form
Family history
Smoking status
info: Please enter directly the patient’s health checkup result data and request an analysis.
The required fields are marked with an asterisk ‘*’. If you do not know the values of the optional fields, please leave it blank.
form.name: Name

message.name: Please enter your name

height.error: The height must be between 101 and 250.

weight.error: Your weight should be between 26 and 200.

bpHigh.required: Please enter your systolic blood pressure
bpHigh.error: Systolic blood pressure should be between 70 and 300.

bpLwst.required: Please enter your diastolic blood pressure
bpLwst.error: Your diastolic blood pressure should be between 36 and 200.

message.waist: The waist circumference should be between 51 and 299
message.blds: The blood glucose level should be between 26 and 999
message.totChole: The total cholesterol level should be between 26 and 999
message.triglyceride: The triglycerides level should be between 1 and 9999
message.hdlChole: The high-density lipoprotein (HDL) cholesterol level should be between 1 and 999
message.ldlChole: The low-density lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol level should be between 1 and 999
message.hmg: The hemoglobin level should be between 1 and 20.39
message.creatinine: The creatinine level should be between 0.1 and 99
message.sgotAst: The Serum Glutamic-Oxaloacetic Transaminase (SGOT/AST) level should be between 1 and 9999
message.sgptAlt: The Serum Glutamic-Pyruvic Transaminase (SGPT/ALT) level should be between 1 and 9999
message.gammaGtp: The Gamma-Glutamyl Transferase (GGT/GTP) level should be between 1 and 9999

image.title: Image Analysis
image.description: Please take a photo and upload the template containing the patient's health checkup result data.
info: Requests can only be made with
To change the registered template, please send us an
After uploading the image file, click the ‘Analyze Image’ button to extract the image data. To upload another image, click the 'Reupload Image' button.
Please check if the extracted data is correct before requesting an analysis. You can edit the values once the image has been analyzed.

modal.title: Please select your preferred method of submitting an analysis request

excel: Request an analysis by uploading an Excel file containing the examiner's health checkup results.
This method is recommended for large numbers of patients.
If you do not have a standard form, please download and use the Excel file sample as a template.
form: Request an analysis by directly entering the examiner's health checkup results in a form.
This method is recommended for a smaller number of patients.
image: Take a photo of a form containing the examiner’s health checkup results and upload to the platform.
This method is recommended for a smaller number of patients.
If you do not have a standard form, please download and use the sample questionnaire form as a template.

agree.title: ANRISK Personal Information Usage
description: Users must comply with relevant laws when directly uploading patient information to the ANRISK™ platform and must exercise caution so that accurate information is uploaded. Users are solely responsible for any violation of relevant laws or the uploading of inaccurate information due to their intentional or negligent actions.

The reports generated by the ANRISK™ platform are statistical comparisons of similarities between the provided data and the health information of patients with cerebral aneurysms. These reports do not constitute medical judgment or diagnosis. Users may use the reports for reference purposes and are responsible for its use.
agree.checkbox: I agree to the collection and use of personal information as stated above

modal.disagree: To analyze the report, your consent is required for the use of personal information
modal.success: We will send you an email notification once the analysis has been completed.
